original_text: but you shall fear the Lord, who brought you out of the land of Egypt with great power and with an outstretched arm. You shall bow yourselves to him, and to him you shall sacrifice.
korean_text: 오직 큰 능력과 편 팔로 너희를 애굽에서 인도하여 내신 여호와만 경외하여 그를 예배하며 그에게 제사를 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: but you shall fear the Lord
who brought you out of the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내신 분이시니

sentences.original_text: You shall bow yourselves to him
and to him you shall sacrifice
